Quick Tutorial¶

Installation/Usage¶

As the package has not been published on PyPi yet, it CANNOT be install using pip.

For now, the suggested method is to put the file Temporal_Community_Detection.py in the same directory as your source files and call from Temporal_Community_Detection import temporal_network

Initiate a temporal_network object¶

Temporal networks are a subclass of multilayer/multiplex networks encoding the dynamical systems change over time as a set of networks. Our main object is a temporal_network and it accepts multiple type of data. One can provide the temporal connectivity as a list of adjacency matrices, a tensor or a dictionary of edge list. See API for more information.
